video_prompt: Woman with cascading blue and gold gown shifts gaze, head tilting, as she sits on a living armchair with subtly expanding roots. Gigantic blue and gold flowers gently unfurl and recede in the background. Soft glow points pulse, reminiscent of stars or fireflies, across the dark sky. The scene breathes with a serene, magical flow.
image_prompt: Highly detailed full shot: A fantasy woman with long silver-white hair, in an ornate blue and gold gown, sits on a blue armchair carved from gnarled roots. She faces forward, head tilted, in a magical garden of gigantic blue and gold flowers under a dark, star-like sky. Her dress features a deep V-neck bodice with gold embroidery and a skirt of shimmering golden, petal-like scales flowing into blue fabric. Soft, magical lighting. Vertical aspect.
refined_video_prompt: Woman shifts gaze, head gently tilting. Blue and gold gown subtly flows. Armchair roots gradually expand. Gigantic blue and gold flowers unfurl, then recede in background. Soft glow points pulse and drift across dark sky.
